tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Stock (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    quantity INTEGER NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    sale_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE stock (id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name STRING, quantity INT);
CREATE TABLE sales (id INT PRIMARY KEY, sale_date DATE, product_id INT, quantity_sold INT);
CREATE TABLE stock_updates (id INT PRIMARY KEY, update_date DATE, product_id INT, updated_quantity INT);

CREATE TABLE StockTransactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    transaction_type VARCHAR,
    quantity_change INT,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    sale_date DATE,
    quantity_sold INT,
    total_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
